original_title: Picture This: The Times of Peter Bogdanovich in Archer City, Texas
overview: A visceral deconstruction of Academy Award nominated Peter Bogdanovich and the nervous breakdown he nearly had while shooting THE LAST PICTURE SHOW.
tagline: Once upon a time a movie company shot an Academy Award winning film in a small Texas Town... For the people involved, nothing was ever the same
title: Picture This: The Times of Peter Bogdanovich in Archer City, Texas
